name: Meter.io Wrapped stMTRG
description: wstMTRG is a wrapped version of stMTRG. stMTRG is liquid staking token on Meter Network. The amount of stMTRG balance is not constant; it changes daily as staking rewards come in. As some DeFi protocols require a constant balance mechanism for tokens, wstMTRG keeps the balance of stMTRG fixed and uses an underlying share system to reflect the staking rewards.
